muted/purge.text: Explain yourself, why you are here and why we should unmute you. Deal with the staff who muted you. Good luck

nickname.text: You can't change your nickname because of the Sloth game. The class Munk can use a command that will add a "Munk" to you nickname. It can also create a tribe (like a club) that will add emojis to your nickname. We don't want people removing the Munk or impersonating the tribe members, so we turned off ability to change the nickname.

classes.text:
**What are classes ?**
Classes are held by volunteer teachers in a voice chat created at the time of their class. You're free to participate as long as you're respectful. They're weekly for most and you can find the updates or messages from the teachers in the #:bell:lesson-announcements-:bell::flag_gb:



**Here is the calendar with all the classes** :calendar: :calendar_spiral:
https://thelanguagesloth.com/class/calendar/



**Why can I not join class?** :school_satchel:

If you're not able to join a class despite having the **studying role** for that language, please chose one of the **English** :flag_gb: :flag_us: roles (studying, fluent or native)

If you're neither native nor want to get pings for English classes then please chose the "Fluent English" role.

Thank you

Watch this video and in addition to what shown in the video add one of the English roles:
https://youtu.be/Eut_7Scv6bE

global.text: Welcome to the global chat! Please remember that English is the encouraged language in this text channel. Smaller conversations in other languages are allowed, but longer conversations in another language belong in their respective text channels.

searching teachers.text:
In the light of the pandemic we have seen a surge of language learners interested in focusing their extra time in languages.

We in The Language Sloth want to encourage everyone to help each other grow and reach linguistic goals. These times can be isolating, so we believe that now more than ever is a great time to meet international people with different mindsets and cultures united by this epidemic.

This is why we are opening our teacher applications for anyone who is interested in participating in our global community. If you think you would like to help people learn your language, consider applying in <#729454413290143774> by reacting to the appropriate button
